import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import "../Styles/SingleUserPosts.css" import PostService from "../../../modules/Post/Service/service"; import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; export default function SingleUserPosts(){ const user = useSelector((state) =>state.profile.value) const getSinglePost = async()=>{ await PostService.getSinglePost(user._id) .then((res)=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } useEffect(()=>{ getSinglePost() },[user._id]) return( <>
